author: myrnavl
msg: DERBY-5686; multiple intermittent errors in nightly tests during DriverMgrAuthenticationTest test. reason: An SQL data change is not permitted for a read-only connection, user or database.
committing patch DERBY_5686_1.diff (after removing some unnecessary imports).

this happens during teardown of the DatabasePropertyTestSetup.
